DOMDocument.versionInfo: Saved by Adobe Flash Macintosh 12.0 build 481

Actionscript.script: import inn.nowri.ka.hwanime.HandwrittenAnimation; import inn.nowri.ka.hwanime.HandwrittenAnimationVO; import inn.nowri.ka.hwanime.HandwrittenAnimationEvent; import flash.display.BitmapData; import flash.display.Bitmap; import flash.display.Sprite; function created(e:HandwrittenAnimationEvent):void { //anime.scaleX=anime.scaleY=1; //anime.x = stage.stageWidth/2 - anime.width/2 +5; //anime.y = stage.stageHeight/2 - anime.height/2 +5; anime.play(); addChild(container); container.width=480; container.scaleY = container.scaleX; container.x = stage.stageWidth/2 - container.width/2; container.y = stage.stageHeight/2 - container.height/2; } /** * * BitmapData のリサイズ * * @param BitmapData src 元となる BitmapData オブジェクト * @param Number hRatio 水平方向のリサイズ比率 * @param Number vRatio 垂直方向のリサイズ比率 * @return BitmapData リサイズされた BitmapData オブジェクト * */ function resize(src:BitmapData, hRatio:Number, vRatio:Number):BitmapData { var res:BitmapData = new BitmapData( Math.ceil(src.width * hRatio), Math.ceil(src.height * vRatio) ); res.draw(src, new Matrix(hRatio, 0, 0, vRatio), null, null, null, true); return res; } var container:Sprite = new Sprite(); var bmd:BitmapData = new TxtBg(0,0); var bmp:Bitmap = new Bitmap(bmd); var anime:HandwrittenAnimation = new HandwrittenAnimation(new Txt(0,0), new HandwrittenAnimationVO(1, 10, 4, 1, 0.4, -1, false)); anime.addEventListener(HandwrittenAnimationEvent.CREATE_COMPLETE, created); container.addChild(bmp); container.addChild(anime); //bmp.x = stage.stageWidth/2 - bmp.width/2; //bmp.y = stage.stageHeight/2 - bmp.height/2;
